Name: ground granulated blast furnace slag to generic market for supplementary cementitious materials | supplementary cementitious materials | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21557/documentation

This activity is a renaming activity, linking ground granulated blast furnace slag to the generic market for supplementary cementitious materials (SCM).

The activity starts with the input of GGBFS.

With the provision of a generic kg of supplementary cementitious materials.
